department: Dep. of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Regional Individual Standing Offer (RISO) for Waste Management Services for DFO/Canadian Coast Guard Vessels operating in Newfoundland and Labrador.
description: The Canadian Coast Guard has a requirement to establish a Regional Individual Standing Offer (RISO) to provide services of labour, parts, material and equipment necessary to provide Waste Management Services for DFO/Canadian Coast Guard Vessels operating in Newfoundland and Labrador. The period of this Regional Individual Standing Offer will be from date of issuance for 2 years with option for the extension period of 1 year.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
## F6855-220008 WASTE OIL MANAGEMENT

### Solicitation Details
* Contract Reference Number: WS3866170626-Doc3866650688
* Solicitation Number: WS3866170626
* Publication Date: February 14, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: March 9, 2023, 2:00 PM EST
* Expected Contract Start Date: March 23, 2023

### Service Description
The Canadian Coast Guard (CCG) requires a Regional Individual Standing Offer (RISO) to provide Waste Management Services for DFO/CCG vessels operating in Newfoundland and Labrador. This tender will include services such as labor, materials, and equipment, and will be valid for two years with an option for a one-year extension.

### Tender Evaluation Criteria
Tenders will be evaluated based on the lowest price.

### Notice Details
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Regions of Opportunity: None
* Regions of Delivery: St. John's, NL
* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* End User Entity: Canadian Coast Guard (CCG)
* Point of Contact:
  * Jonathan Grant (SPAC/PSPC)
  * Phone: Not Available
  * Email: jonathan.grant@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* Tender Notice URL: <http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15401424?extsite=MTU0MDE0MjRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>

### Part 1 - Service Requirements
    * Scope of work: Waste Management Services for DFO/CCG vessels operating in Newfoundland and Labrador
    * Work location: Various locations in Newfoundland and Labrador, including St. John’s

### Part 2 - Evaluation Criteria and Weighting

    A) Lowest Price [60%]
    B) Evaluation of Company capabilities [20%]
    C) Business History [10%]
    D) Certifications, Licenses and approvals [10%]

_The Service will not be delayed in the event of unforeseen conditions including changes to any NASA standards, conditions or methods of operation._
